Chatbot Response: प्रधानमंत्री आवास योजना (ग्रामीण) ग्रामीण गरीबांसाठी परवडणारी घरे उपलब्ध करून देते.
प्रधानमंत्री आवास योजना (ग्रामीण) ग्रामीण गरीबों के लिए किफायती आवास प्रदान करती है।
ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ଆବାସ ଯୋଜନା (ଗ୍ରାମୀଣ) ଗ୍ରାମୀଣ ଦରିଦ୍ର ପାଇଁ ସସ୍ତା ଘର ପ୍ରଦାନ କରେ।
Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Rural) provides affordable housing for the rural poor.

The Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN) provides financial assistance of rs6,000 per year to farmers for their agricultural needs.  
Required documents: Aadhaar Card, Bank Account Details, Land Record Documents, Mobile Number.  
Eligibility: Small and marginal farmers owning less than 2 hectares of agricultural land.  
Registration platform: Apply online at https://pmkisan.gov.in or through the nearest CSC (Common Service Center).

The Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) ensures 100 days of employment to rural households.  
Required documents: Job Card, Aadhaar Card, Bank Account Details.  
Eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.  
Registration platform: Applications can be submitted at the local Gram Panchayat office.

The PM Ujjwala Yojana provides free LPG connections to BPL families to promote clean cooking fuel.  
Required documents: Aadhaar Card, BPL Certificate, Address Proof, Bank Account Details.  
Eligibility: Women from BPL families without an existing LPG connection.  
Registration platform: Apply at the nearest LPG distributor or online at https://www.pmuy.gov.in.
பிரதான் மந்திரி அவாஸ் யோஜனா (கிராமப்புறம்) கிராமப்புற ஏழைகளுக்கு மலிவான வீடுகளை வழங்குகிறது.

Required documents: Job Card, Aadhaar Card, Bank Account Details.  
Eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.  
Registration platform: Applications can be submitted at the local Gram Panchayat office.

The Stand-Up India scheme supports women and SC/ST entrepreneurs with loans between rs10 lakh to rs1 crore for setting up businesses.  
Required documents: Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, Caste Certificate (if applicable), Business Plan, Bank Account Details.  
Eligibility: Women or SC/ST individuals above 18 years planning to start a business.  
Registration platform: Online application available at https://www.standupmitra.in or through bank branches.
